sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Box,Stack,Typography} from '@mui/material' import SideBar from './SideBar' import Videos from './Videos' import { FetchFromApi } from '../utils/FetchFromApi' const Feed = () => { const [selectedCategories, setselectedCategories] = useState("New") const [videos, setVideos] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { FetchFromApi(`search?part=snippet&q=${selectedCategories}`) .then((data) =>setVideos(data.items)) } ,[selectedCategories]) return ( Copyright 2022 YT clone {selectedCategories} Videos ) } export default Feed
